佖字的基本解释

佖
bì
满，充满。

佖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》毗必切，入質，並。］
［《廣韻》房密切，入質，並。］
(1)见“佖佖”。
(2)布满。

佖字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佖； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页98第16
【廣韻】毗必切【集韻】【韻會】薄必切【正韻】薄密切，?音弼。有威儀也。【詩·小雅】威儀怭怭。【說文】作佖佖。◎按《詩·賓筵》威儀怭怭。註訓媟慢，承上旣醉而言，謂醉無儀也。《說文》引《詩》訓威儀，與《詩》義反。此《說文》之誤，諸韻書仍之，?非。　又滿也。【揚雄·羽獵賦】騈衍佖路。

考證：〔【揚雄·校獵賦】騈衍佖路。〕　謹照原文校獵賦改羽獵賦。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　佖; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 98-16
[Guang Yun] Bibi cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Thin Bi cut [Zheng Yun] thin and close,? Yinbi. There are also prestige. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Prestige and daunting. [Speaking of text] as a felicitous. ◎According to "Poetry·Bin Yan", the prestige and daunting. Note that the training is slow, and in the context of drunkenness, it is said that drunk has no manners. "Shuowen" quotes "Poetry" as a prestige, which is contrary to "Poem". The mistake of this "Shuowen" is still the same in all rhyme books.　It's full again. [Yang Xiong·Yu Lie Fu] Yan Yan Yi Lu. Textual research: [[Yang Xiong·School Lie Fu] Yan Yan Ji Lu. 〕 　 I would like to change the feather hunting verse according to the original text.
